<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This fix script is used to handle the updates for the CSM Portal VA URL redirect properties into new table sys_cs_portal_url_mapping for sys_publications_publication</description> <name>Update Publication URL Redirect Prop CSM</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[ var includeList = ['13cf507b3b2123009cbbcea234efc4b7'];
new CSUrlRedirectUtils().updateBUPortalProperties(includeList);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-04-21 06:31:57</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6a405cdb05a72010f877fbf8971bde50</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update Publication URL Redirect Prop CSM</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">29a507b9db01111086a072c7f4961932</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_6a405cdb05a72010f877fbf8971bde50</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-04-21 06:31:57</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Update Publication URL Redirect Prop CSM
